sent.orig: Bike is the short form of bicycle.
Y is sometimes a vowel, as in bicycle.
sent.trans: Y有时是元音字母，如在单字bicycle中。

sent.orig: Food Products, Engineering Goods and Equipment, Bicycles, Components and Spares, Bicycle and Bicycle Parts, Engineering Goods.
sent.trans: 采购产品食品，工程商品和设备，脚踏车，零件和零部件，脚踏车和脚踏车零件，工程商品。

sent.orig: Can Mary ride a bicycle? Yes, she can (ride a bicycle).
sent.trans: 玛丽会骑脚踏车吗？是的，她会（骑脚踏车）。

sent.orig: I park my bicycle in the bicycle shed every day.
sent.trans: 我每天都把自行车停在楼下的车棚里。
